summary:
Introducing G|Digital Economy - Gyre, a crypto token built on Binance Smart Chain. It is brought up right in the market with an aim to empower people to enter the Era of Digital Payments, and Adapt the Culture of Web 3.0

 Gyre Network, An Ecosystem - Gyre Token is coming up with an scoop ecosystem where crypto fanatics can Build Digital Network & Crypto Trading simultaneously

 Play and Earn - Spin wheel & get up to 9 Gyres daily

 Staking Income - Stake the tokens in your wallet & earn staking income daily

 Network Staking Income - Ask your friends to invest & stake tokens, get a chance to additional rewards (network staking income)

 Network Income - Refer the App to your friends & get rewarded

 Referral Income - Build a team of 5, get top up into your wallet

 Royalty Income - After holding the stipulated amount of tokens, the users will get royalty income.

 Unlock Endless possibilities - Coming Soon

 Gaming Token - Coming Soon

 Travel Booking Platform - Coming Soon

 Crypto Education Academy - Coming Soon

 E-Commerce Platform - Coming Soon

 Transaction Fee on exchange - Make payments in Gyre

 Crypto Credit Card - Coming Soon

 ROADMAP - 

 Why Team Up With Us? - Web3 Awareness, Source of Good ROI, Community Engagement
